abstract: Veteran comedy writer Merrill Markoe talks about her whimsical home decorating style and her new book of humorous essays entitled Cool, Calm & Contentious.
snippet: The veteran comedy writer and author of a new book of essays, “Cool, Calm & Contentious,” has filled her Malibu, Calif., home with unusual statues, portraits and more.
lead_paragraph: The veteran comedy writer and author of a new book of essays, “Cool, Calm & Contentious,” has filled her Malibu, Calif., home with unusual statues, portraits and more.

headline.main: Merrill Markoe on Puppets and Monkey Portraits
headline.print_headline: Merrill Markoe on Puppets and Monkey Portraits
headline.seo: Q&A: The Comedy Writer Merrill Markoe
